original_text: The Lord Almighty says, ‘These people will belong to me. One day I will come to judge everyone. At that time I will bring together all my own special people. I will not punish them. I will take care of them, like a father takes care of his son who serves him.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와가 이르노라 나는 내가 정한 날에 그들을 나의 특별한 소유로 삼을 것이요 또 사람이 자기를 섬기는 아들을 아낌 같이 내가 그들을 아끼리니

sentences.original_text: These people will belong to me
One day I will come to judge everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 언젠가 내가 모든 사람을 심판하러 오리라

sentences.original_text: I will bring together all my own special people
I will take care of them
like a father takes care of his son who serves him
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 아버지가 섬기는 아들을 돌보는 것처럼
